11.ara-name: كتاب النكاح عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Amr bin Rabi'ah narrated from his father:"A woman from Banu Fazarah was married for (the dowry of) two sandals. So the Messenger of Allah said to her: 'Do you approve of (exchanging) yourself and your wealth for two sandals?' She said: 'Yes.'" He said: "So he permitted it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي مُهُورِ النِّسَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Women's Dowries
